entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 26 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 26 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
